name: jul-utan-djur
description: Inspiring a more ethical and sustainable Swedish Christmas food tradition.

scripts.start: npm run build && pm2 startOrReload julutandjur.js
scripts.build: npm run build-js && npm run build-css
scripts.build-js: browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] --extension=.jsx --extension=.js src/app.jsx | uglifyjs --compress -o public/js/bundle.js
scripts.watch: watchify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] --extension=.jsx --extension=.js src/app.jsx -o public/js/bundle.js --debug --verbose
